# Calculate the number of days for past 12 months first_day = payslip.date_from + relativedelta(months=-12, day=1) last_day = payslip.date_to + relativedelta(day=1) total_days = (last_day - first_day).days

# Calculate the work rate number_of_days = last_year_payslips._get_number_of_worked_days(only_full_pay=True) number_of_months = number_of_days / total_days * 12
